ai-snp5.16:1.3_0: The Seer didn’t answer in the world,
ai-snp5.16:1.4_0: he gives the third time the Queen.
ai-snp5.16:2.2_0: the Eternal Youth from the Brahmā realm.
ai-snp5.16:3.2_0: There is a question that should be answered,
ai-snp5.16:3.3_0: How do you see the world?
ai-snp5.16:3.4_0: then the King of Death won’t see you.”
ai-snp5.16:4.4_0: so death will cross over death.
ai-snp5.16:4.6_0: king of Death won’t see you.”
